song.eTitle: Every Star Shall Sing a Carol

verses.verse: Every star shall sing a carol; Every creatures, high or low, Come and praise the King of heaven By whatever name you know.
verses.refrain: God above, Man below, Holy is the name I know.
verses.verse: When the King of all creation Had a cradle on the earth, Holy was the human body, Holy was the human birth.
Every star and every planet, Every creature, high or low, Come and praise the King of heaven By whatever name you know.
